subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: I Want Revenge, scratched after veterinarians detected lameness in his left front ankle, will probably miss the Preakness Stakes as well, his trainer Jeff Mullins said.
snippet: I Want Revenge, scratched after veterinarians detected lameness in his left front ankle, will probably miss the Preakness Stakes as well, his trainer Jeff Mullins said.
